00087 void SceneModel::SetCoinScene( SoSceneKit& coinScene )
00088 {
00089         Trace trace( "SceneModel::SetCoinScene", false );
00090             
00091     m_coinScene = &coinScene;   
00092     delete m_instanceRoot;   
00093     m_instanceRoot = new InstanceNode( m_coinScene );
00094     
00095     QList< InstanceNode* > instanceRootNodeList;
00096     m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( &coinScene, instanceRootNodeList ) );
00097     m_mapCoinQt[ &coinScene].append( m_instanceRoot );
00098     
00099     TLightKit* coinLight = dynamic_cast< TLightKit* >( m_coinScene->getPart("lightList[0]", false ) );
00100     if ( coinLight ) 
00101     {
00102         InstanceNode* instanceLight = new InstanceNode( coinLight );
00103                 m_instanceRoot->AddChild( instanceLight );
00104     }
00105     
00106     SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = dynamic_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( m_coinScene->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00107  
00108     if ( coinPartList && coinPartList->getNumChildren() == 0 )
00109     {
00110         TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = new TSeparatorKit();
00111                 separatorKit->ref();
00112         
00113                 coinPartList->addChild( separatorKit );
00114         separatorKit->setSearchingChildren( true );             
00115         
00116         InstanceNode* instanceSeparator = new InstanceNode( separatorKit );
00117         m_instanceRoot->AddChild( instanceSeparator );
00118         
00119         QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00120         m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( separatorKit, instanceNodeList ) );
00121         m_mapCoinQt[separatorKit].append( instanceSeparator );
00122                         
00123     }
00124     else
00125     {
00126                 //Is TSeparatorKit node 
00127                 TSeparatorKit* coinChild = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( coinPartList->getChild( 0 ) );
00128                 if ( !coinChild ) return;
00129                                 
00130         InstanceNode* instanceChild = new InstanceNode( coinChild );
00131             m_instanceRoot->AddChild( instanceChild );
00132             
00133             QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00134             m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( coinChild, instanceNodeList ) );
00135             m_mapCoinQt[coinChild].append( instanceChild );
00136             
00137             GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceChild );
00138 
00139 
00140     }       
00141     reset();
00142 }
00143 
00144 void SceneModel::GenerateInstanceTree( InstanceNode& instanceParent )
00145 {
00146         Trace trace( "SceneModel::GenerateInstanceTree", false );
00147         SoNode* parentNode = instanceParent.GetNode();
00148  
00149         if (parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00150         {
00151                 SoBaseKit* parentKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( parentNode );
00152                 if (parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00153                 {
00154                         //Is TShapeKit node     
00155                         TShapeKit* parentKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
00156                         
00157                         SoNode* shape = parentKit->getPart("shape", false);
00158                         if( shape )
00159                         {
00160                                 InstanceNode* shapeChild = new InstanceNode( shape );
00161                                 instanceParent.AddChild( shapeChild );
00162                                     
00163                             QList< InstanceNode* > shapeNodeList;
00164                                 m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( shape, shapeNodeList ) );
00165                                 m_mapCoinQt[shape].append( shapeChild );
00166                         }
00167                         
00168                         SoNode* material = parentKit->getPart("appearance.material", false);
00169                         if( material )
00170                         {
00171                                 InstanceNode* materialChild = new InstanceNode( material );
00172                                 instanceParent.AddChild( materialChild );
00173                                     
00174                             QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00175                                 m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( material, instanceNodeList ) );
00176                                 m_mapCoinQt[material].append( materialChild );
00177                         }
00178                         
00179                 }
00180                 else
00181                 {
00182                         //Is TSeparatorKit node 
00183                         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = dynamic_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( parentKit->getPart( "childList", false ) );
00184                         if ( !coinPartList ) return;
00185                         
00186                         for( int index = 0; index < coinPartList->getNumChildren(); index++ )
00187                 {
00188                     SoBaseKit* coinChild = dynamic_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinPartList->getChild( index ) );
00189                     InstanceNode* instanceChild = new InstanceNode( coinChild );
00190                     instanceParent.AddChild( instanceChild );
00191                     
00192                     QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00193                     m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( coinChild, instanceNodeList ) );
00194                     m_mapCoinQt[coinChild].append( instanceChild );
00195                     
00196                     GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceChild );
00197                 }
00198             }
00199         } 
00200 }

00202 QModelIndex SceneModel::index( int row, int column, const QModelIndex& parentModelIndex ) const
00203 {
00204         Trace trace( "SceneModel::index" );
00205                 
00206         if ( !m_instanceRoot ) return QModelIndex();            
00207         InstanceNode* instanceParent = NodeFromIndex( parentModelIndex );       
00208     return createIndex( row, column, instanceParent->children[ row ] );   
00209 }       
00210 
00211 InstanceNode* SceneModel::NodeFromIndex( const QModelIndex& modelIndex ) const
00212 {
00213         Trace trace( "SceneModel::NodeFromIndex", false );
00214         
00215         if ( modelIndex.isValid() ) return static_cast< InstanceNode* >( modelIndex.internalPointer() );                
00216     else return m_instanceRoot;
00217 }

00219 int SceneModel::rowCount( const QModelIndex& parentModelIndex ) const
00220 {       
00221         Trace trace( "SceneModel::rowCount" );
00222         
00223         InstanceNode* instanceParent = NodeFromIndex( parentModelIndex );
00224     return ( instanceParent ) ? ( instanceParent->children.count() ) : 0;
00225 }
00226 
00227 int SceneModel::columnCount( const QModelIndex& ) const
00228 {
00229         Trace trace( "SceneModel::columnCount" );
00230         return 1;
00231 }
00232 
00233 QModelIndex SceneModel::parent( const QModelIndex& childModelIndex ) const
00234 {
00235         Trace trace( "SceneModel::parent" );
00236                 
00237     InstanceNode* instanceChild = NodeFromIndex( childModelIndex );
00238     if ( !instanceChild ) return QModelIndex();
00239     
00240     InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceChild->GetParent();
00241     if ( !instanceParent ) return QModelIndex();
00242     
00243     InstanceNode* instanceGrandparent = instanceParent->GetParent();
00244     if ( !instanceGrandparent ) return QModelIndex();
00245     
00246     int row = instanceGrandparent->children.indexOf( instanceParent );
00247     return createIndex( row, childModelIndex.column(), instanceParent );
00248 }

00250 QVariant SceneModel::headerData( int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, int role ) const
00251 {
00252         Trace trace( "SceneModel::headerData" );
00253         
00254         if ( orientation == Qt::Horizontal && role == Qt::DisplayRole) 
00255         {
00256                 if ( section == 0 ) return tr( "Node" );
00257     }
00258     return QVariant();
00259 }
00260 
00261 QVariant SceneModel::data( const QModelIndex& modelIndex, int role ) const
00262 {
00263     Trace trace( "SceneModel::data", false );
00264 
00265         if ( role != Qt::DisplayRole && role != Qt::UserRole && role != Qt::DecorationRole ) return QVariant();
00266 
00267     InstanceNode* instanceNode = NodeFromIndex( modelIndex );
00268     if ( !instanceNode ) return QVariant();
00269     
00270 
00271     if ( modelIndex.column() == 0 ) 
00272     {
00273         SoNode* coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
00274         if ( !coinNode ) return QVariant();
00275         
00276         if ( role == Qt::DisplayRole )
00277         {
00278             if ( coinNode )
00279             {
00280                 QString nodeName;
00281                 if ( coinNode->getName() == SbName() )
00282                         nodeName = QString( coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString() );
00283                 else
00284                         nodeName = QString( coinNode->getName().getString() );
00285                 
00286                 
00287                                 SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00288                                 coinSearch->setNode( coinNode );
00289                                 coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::ALL);
00290                                 coinSearch->apply( m_coinRoot );
00291                                 
00292                                 int numReferences = coinSearch->getPaths( ).getLength();
00293                                 
00294                                 QString references ( " ( " );
00295                                 references += QString::number( numReferences, 10);
00296                                 references += " )  " ;
00297                                 
00298                                 delete coinSearch;
00299                                 
00300                 return references + nodeName;
00301             }
00302             else return new QVariant();
00303         }
00304             
00305         if ( role == Qt::UserRole )
00306         {       
00307                 SoNodeKitPath* coinKitPath = PathFromIndex(modelIndex);
00308                 if ( coinKitPath )
00309                 {
00310                         PathWrapper pathWrapper( coinKitPath );
00311                     return QVariant::fromValue( pathWrapper );
00312        
00313                 }
00314                 return new QVariant();
00315         }
00316         if (role == Qt::DecorationRole) 
00317         {
00318                 
00319                         QString type = coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString();
00320                         
00321                         if ( type == "TSeparatorKit")
00322                         {
00323                                 return QIcon(":/icons/separatorKit.png");
00324                         }
00325                         if ( ( type == "TLightKit") || ( type == "" ) )
00326                         {
00327                                 return QIcon(":/icons/lightKit.png");
00328                         }
00329                         else if (coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
00330                         {
00331                                 TTracker* tracker = static_cast<TTracker*>( coinNode );
00332                                 QString icon = tracker->getIcon();
00333                                 return QIcon(icon);
00334                         } 
00335                         else if ( type == "TShapeKit" )
00336                         {
00337                                 SoBaseKit* nodeKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNode );
00338                                 TShape* kit = static_cast<TShape*>(nodeKit->getPart( "shape", false ));
00339                                 if( kit ) return QIcon(kit->getIcon());
00340                                 return QIcon(":/icons/shapekit.png");
00341                         }
00342                         else if (coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(SoShape::getClassTypeId() ) )
00343                         {
00344                                 TShape* shape = static_cast<TShape*>( coinNode );
00345                                 return QIcon(shape->getIcon());
00346                         } 
00347                         else if (coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TMaterial::getClassTypeId() ) )
00348                         {
00349                                 TMaterial* material = static_cast<TMaterial*>( coinNode );
00350                                 return QIcon(material->getIcon());
00351                         } 
00352         }
00353     }  
00354     return QVariant();
00355 }
00356 
00357 int SceneModel::InsertCoinNode( SoNode& coinChild, SoBaseKit& coinParent )
00358 {
00359         Trace trace( "SceneModel::InsertCoinNode", false );
00360         
00361         int row = -1;
00362         if (coinParent.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00363         {
00364                 SoBaseKit* childKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( &coinChild );
00365                 
00366                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = dynamic_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", true ) );
00367                 if ( !coinPartList ) return -1;
00368                 
00369                 row = coinPartList->getNumChildren();
00370                 
00371                 coinPartList->addChild( childKit );
00372                 childKit->setSearchingChildren( true );
00373                         
00374         }
00375         else
00376         {
00377                 TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* > ( &coinParent );
00378                 if( shapeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) ) row++;
00379                 if( shapeKit->getPart( "appearance.material", false ) ) row++;
00380         }
00381         
00382         QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00383         for ( int index = 0; index < instanceListParent.count(); index++ )
00384         {
00385             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00386                 InstanceNode* instanceChild = new InstanceNode( &coinChild );
00387                 instanceParent->InsertChild( row, instanceChild );
00388                 
00389                 //Inserting InstanceNode in the map
00390                 QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00391                 m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( &coinChild, instanceNodeList ) );
00392         m_mapCoinQt[ &coinChild ].append( instanceChild );
00393         
00394         GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceChild );         
00395         }       
00396         emit layoutChanged();
00397         
00398         return row;
00399 }
00400 
00401 void SceneModel::InsertLightNode( TLightKit& coinLight )
00402 {
00403         Trace trace( "SceneModel::InsertLightNode", false );
00404         
00405         TLightKit* previousLightKit = dynamic_cast< TLightKit* >( m_coinScene->getPart("lightList[0]", true) );
00406     if ( !previousLightKit ) 
00407     {
00408         InstanceNode* separatorNode = m_instanceRoot->children[0];
00409         m_instanceRoot->AddChild( separatorNode );
00410     }
00411     
00412     m_coinScene->setPart( "lightList[0]", &coinLight );
00413     m_instanceRoot->children.removeAt( 0 );
00414     
00415     InstanceNode* instanceLight = new InstanceNode( &coinLight );
00416         m_instanceRoot->InsertChild( 0, instanceLight );
00417     
00418    emit layoutChanged();
00419 }

00421 
00422 void SceneModel::RemoveCoinNode( int row, SoBaseKit& coinParent )
00423 {
00424         Trace trace( "SceneModel::RemoveCoinNode", false );
00425         
00426         if (coinParent.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00427         {
00428                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = dynamic_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", false ) );   
00429             if ( coinPartList ) coinPartList->removeChild( row );
00430         }
00431         
00432     QList<InstanceNode*> instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00433         
00434         for( int index = 0; index< instanceListParent.size(); index++ )
00435         {
00436             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00437             InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceParent->children[row];
00438             instanceParent->children.removeAt(row);
00439             
00440             QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceList = m_mapCoinQt[ instanceNode->GetNode()];
00441                 instanceList.removeAt( instanceList.indexOf( instanceNode ) );
00442         }
00443         emit layoutChanged();
00444 }
00445 
00446 void SceneModel::RemoveLightNode( TLightKit& coinLight )
00447 {
00448         Trace trace( "SceneModel::RemoveLightNode", false );
00449         
00450         SoNodeKitListPart* lightList = dynamic_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( m_coinScene->getPart( "lightList", true ) );
00451     if ( lightList ) lightList->removeChild( &coinLight );
00452     
00453     m_instanceRoot->children.removeAt( 0 );
00454     
00455     emit layoutChanged();
00456     
00457 }

00459 Qt::ItemFlags SceneModel::flags( const QModelIndex& modelIndex ) const
00460 {
00461   Qt::ItemFlags defaultFlags = QAbstractItemModel::flags( modelIndex );
00462 
00463    if ( modelIndex.isValid() ) 
00464    {
00465       if ( modelIndex.column() > 0 ) return defaultFlags;
00466       else return Qt::ItemIsDragEnabled | Qt::ItemIsDropEnabled | Qt::ItemIsEditable | defaultFlags;
00467    } 
00468    else return defaultFlags;
00469 }

00477 {
00478         return Qt::CopyAction | Qt::MoveAction;

00480 
00481 void SceneModel::Cut( SoBaseKit& coinParent, int row )
00482 {       
00483         Trace trace( "SceneModel::Cut", false );
00484         
00485         if( row < 0 ) tgf::SevereError( "SceneModel::Cut invalid row number" );
00486         
00487         SoNode* coinChild;
00488         
00489         if (!coinParent.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00490         {
00491                 QList<InstanceNode*> instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00492                 InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[0];
00493                 
00494                 coinChild = instanceParent->children[row]->GetNode();
00495                 SbString partName = coinParent.getPartString( coinChild );
00496                 if( partName.getLength() == 0 ) partName = "material";
00497                 
00498                 coinParent.setPart( partName, NULL );
00499                 
00500                 
00501         }
00502         else
00503         {
00504                 
00505                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = dynamic_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", false ) );
00506                 if( !coinPartList ) tgf::SevereError( "SceneModel::Cut Null coinPartList pointer" );
00507                 
00508                 coinChild = coinPartList->getChild( row );
00509                 if( !coinChild ) tgf::SevereError( "SceneModel::Cut Null coinChild pointer" );      
00510             coinPartList->removeChild( row );
00511         }
00512         
00513             
00514         QList<InstanceNode*> instanceList = m_mapCoinQt[ coinChild ];
00515 
00516         // Test if the node is shared
00517         if( instanceList.size() == 1 )
00518         {
00519             InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceList[0];
00520                 DeleteInstanceTree( *instanceNode );
00521         }
00522         else
00523         {
00524                 QList<InstanceNode*> instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00525                 if( instanceListParent.size() == 1 )
00526                 {
00527                     InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[0];
00528                     InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceParent->children[row];
00529                     DeleteInstanceTree( *instanceNode );
00530                 }
00531                 else
00532                 {
00533                         for( int index = 0; index< instanceListParent.size(); index++ )
00534                         {
00535                             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00536                             InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceParent->children[row];
00537                             DeleteInstanceTree( *instanceNode );
00538                         }
00539                 }
00540         }
00541                 
00542         emit layoutChanged();
00543 }
00544 
00545 void SceneModel::Paste( tgc::PasteType type, SoBaseKit& coinParent, SoNode& coinNode, int row )
00546 {
00547         Trace trace( "SceneModel::Paste", false );
00548         
00549         SoNode* coinChild = 0;
00550         SoNode* pCoinParent = 0;
00551         pCoinParent = &coinParent;
00552         
00553         if ( type == tgc::Shared ) coinChild = &coinNode;
00554         
00555 
00556         switch ( type )
00557         {
00558                 case tgc::Copied : 
00559                     coinChild = dynamic_cast< SoNode* >( coinNode.copy( true ) );
00560                     break;
00561 
00562                 case tgc::Shared :
00563                 default : 
00564                     coinChild = &coinNode;
00565                     break;
00566         } 
00567         if( ! coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00568         {
00569                 TShapeKit* shapeKit = dynamic_cast< TShapeKit* >( pCoinParent );
00570                 if(!shapeKit)
00571                         return;
00572                 if( coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShape::getClassTypeId() ) )
00573                 {
00574                         TShape* shape = static_cast< TShape* >( shapeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) );
00575         
00576                 if (shape)
00577                 {
00578                         std::cout << "This TShapeKit already contains a shape" << std::endl;
00579                         return;
00580                 }
00581                         coinParent.setPart("shape", coinChild );
00582                 }
00583                 else
00584                 {
00585                         TMaterial* material = static_cast< TMaterial* >( shapeKit->getPart( "material", false ) );
00586                         if (material)
00587                 {
00588                         std::cout << "This TShapeKit already contains a material" << std::endl;
00589                         return;
00590                 }
00591                         coinParent.setPart("material", coinChild );
00592                 }
00593         }
00594         else
00595         {
00596                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = dynamic_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", true ) );
00597                 if( !coinPartList ) tgf::SevereError( "SceneModel::Paste Null coinPartList pointer" );
00598                 if( row > 0 && row < coinPartList->getNumChildren( ) ) coinPartList->insertChild( coinChild, row );
00599                 else coinPartList->insertChild( coinChild, row );
00600         }
00601      
00602         QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00603         for ( int index = 0; index < instanceListParent.count(); index++ )
00604         {
00605             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00606                 InstanceNode* instanceChild = new InstanceNode( coinChild );
00607                 instanceParent->InsertChild( row, instanceChild );
00608                 
00609                 //Inserting InstanceNode in the map
00610                 QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00611                 m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( coinChild, instanceNodeList ) );
00612         m_mapCoinQt[ coinChild ].append( instanceChild );       
00613                 GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceChild );
00614         }
00615 
00616         emit layoutChanged();
00617 }
00618 
00619 void SceneModel::DeleteInstanceTree( InstanceNode& instanceNode )
00620 {
00621         Trace trace( "SceneModel::DeleteInstanceTree", false );
00622         
00623         for ( int index = 0; index < instanceNode.children.count(); index++)
00624         {
00625                 DeleteInstanceTree( *instanceNode.children[index] );
00626         }
00627         
00628         QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceList = m_mapCoinQt[ instanceNode.GetNode()];
00629         instanceList.removeAt( instanceList.indexOf( &instanceNode ) );
00630         
00631         InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceNode.GetParent();
00632         int row = instanceParent->children.indexOf( &instanceNode );
00633         
00634         instanceParent->children.removeAt( row );
00635 }
00636 
00637 SoNodeKitPath* SceneModel::PathFromIndex( const QModelIndex& modelIndex ) const
00638 {
00639         Trace trace( "SceneModel::PathFromIndex", false );
00640         
00641         SoNode* coinNode = NodeFromIndex( modelIndex )->GetNode();
00642         
00643         if (!coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00644         {
00645                 QModelIndex parentIndex = parent( modelIndex );
00646                 SoNodeKitPath* parentPath = PathFromIndex( parentIndex );
00647                 
00648                 return parentPath;
00649                 //SoBaseKit* parentNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( NodeFromIndex( parentIndex )->GetNode() );
00650                 //parentNode->createPathToAnyPart()
00651         }
00652         else 
00653         {
00654                 
00655                 SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00656                 coinSearch->setNode( m_coinScene );
00657                 coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST);
00658                 coinSearch->apply( m_coinRoot );
00659                 
00660                 SoPath* coinScenePath = coinSearch->getPath( );
00661                 if( !coinScenePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null coinScenePath." );
00662                 
00663                 SoNodeKitPath* nodePath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* > ( coinScenePath );
00664                 if( !nodePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null nodePath." );
00665                 
00666                 InstanceNode* instanceNode = NodeFromIndex( modelIndex );
00667                 
00668                 SoNodeList nodeList;
00669                 while (instanceNode->GetParent() )
00670                 {
00671                         nodeList.append( instanceNode->GetNode() );
00672                         instanceNode = instanceNode->GetParent();       
00673                 }
00674                 
00675                 for( int i = nodeList.getLength(); i > 0; i--){
00676                         SoBaseKit* coinNode = dynamic_cast< SoBaseKit* >( nodeList[i-1] );
00677                         if ( coinNode )
00678                                 nodePath->append( coinNode );
00679                 }
00680                 return nodePath;
00681         }
00682 }
00683 
00684 QModelIndex SceneModel::IndexFromPath( const SoNodeKitPath& coinNodePath ) const
00685 {
00686         Trace trace( "SceneModel::IndexFromPath", FALSE );
00687             
00688         SoBaseKit* coinNode = dynamic_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNodePath.getTail() );
00689         if( !coinNode ) tgf::SevereError( "IndexFromPath Null coinNode." );
00690         
00691         if( coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString() == "TLightKit") return index( 0, 0 );
00692         
00693         if ( coinNodePath.getLength() > 1 )
00694         {
00695                 SoBaseKit* coinParent = dynamic_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNodePath.getNodeFromTail(1) );
00696                 if( !coinParent ) tgf::SevereError( "IndexFromPath Null coinParent." );
00697                 
00698                 if( coinParent->getTypeId().getName() == SbName( "TLightKit") ) return index( 0, 0 );
00699                 
00700                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = dynamic_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00701         if( !coinPartList ) tgf::SevereError( "IndexFromPath Null coinPartList." );
00702         
00703         int row = coinPartList->findChild(coinNode);
00704                 if(coinNodePath.getNodeFromTail(1) == m_coinScene )
00705                 {
00706                         int child = 0;
00707                         while( child < m_instanceRoot->children.count() )
00708                         {
00709                                 if ( m_instanceRoot->children[child]->GetNode() == coinNode )
00710                                         break;
00711                                 child++;
00712                         }
00713                         return index(child, 0 );
00714                 }else{
00715                         SoNodeKitPath* parentPath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* > ( coinNodePath.copy( 0, 0 ) );
00716                         parentPath->truncate(parentPath->getLength()-1 );
00717                         QModelIndex parentIndex = IndexFromPath( *parentPath );
00718                         
00719                         return index (row, 0, parentIndex );
00720                 }
00721         }
00722         else
00723                 return QModelIndex();
00724                 
00725 }
